mapper.select: -- TableDao.selectMetaTabInfoList(ORACLE) SELECT '추출' as stsnm , UPPER(#{jdbcNm}) as jdbcnm , A.OWNER as owner , A.TABLE_NAME as tabNm , D.COMMENTS as tabHnm , A.COLUMN_ID as colId , A.COLUMN_NAME as colNm , B.COMMENTS as colHnm , CASE WHEN A.DATA_TYPE IN ('CHAR','VARCHAR','VARCHAR2') THEN A.DATA_TYPE||'('||A.DATA_LENGTH||')' WHEN A.DATA_TYPE IN ('NUMBER') THEN A.DATA_TYPE||'('||A.DATA_PRECISION||','||A.DATA_SCALE||')' WHEN A.DATA_TYPE IN ('DATE','TIMESTAMP') THEN A.DATA_TYPE ELSE A.DATA_TYPE END as dataTypeDesc , DECODE(A.NULLABLE,'Y',' ','NOT NULL') as nullable , DECODE(F.COLUMN_NAME,'NULL','','PK') as pk , A.DATA_TYPE as dataTypeNm , A.DATA_LENGTH as len , A.DATA_PRECISION as decimalCnt , C.NUM_ROWS as tabrows , TO_CHAR(E.CREATED,'YYYYMMDD') as tabregdt , TO_CHAR(E.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD') as tabregdt2 , TO_CHAR(E.LAST_DDL_TIME,'YYYYMMDD') as tabupddt , TO_CHAR(E.LAST_DDL_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as tabupddt2 , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF2') as regDtm , '' as regUsrId , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF2') as updDtm , '' as updUsrId FROM SYS.ALL_TAB_COLUMNS A, SYS.ALL_COL_COMMENTS B, SYS.ALL_TABLES C, SYS.ALL_TAB_COMMENTS D, SYS.ALL_OBJECTS E, (SELECT OWNER,TABLE_NAME,COLUMN_NAME FROM SYS.USER_CONS_COLUMNS WHERE OWNER = #{owner} AND CONSTRAINT_NAME IN (SELECT CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM SYS.USER_CONSTRAINTS WHERE OWNER=#{owner} AND CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P') ) F WHERE A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND A.OWNER = C.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME AND A.OWNER = D.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = D.TABLE_NAME AND A.OWNER = E.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = E.OBJECT_NAME AND A.OWNER = F.OWNER(+) AND A.TABLE_NAME = F.TABLE_NAME(+) AND A.COLUMN_NAME = F.COLUMN_NAME(+) AND D.TABLE_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND E.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND A.OWNER = #{owner} AND A.TABLE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{tabNm}||'%' ORDER BY A.TABLE_NAME,A.COLUMN_ID
